items.title: Brera Holdings rebrands as Solmate after oversubscribed $300 million PIPE
items.excerpt: Brera Holdings said it will rebrand as Solmate following an oversubscribed $300 million PIPE that drew high-profile backers, while outlining leadership changes, a Sol acquisition plan and a strategy to expand crypto infrastructure in the UAE. The company also signaled ambitions for dual listings and will retain its sports businesses as it shifts focus to Web
